short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the Cut The Rope Time Travel Offline version on your Google Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cut the Rope: Time Travel, the captivating sequel to the popular puzzle game, is now available on the Chrome Extension platform, allowing players to embark on a time-traveling adventure right from their web browser. In this exciting installment, players join Om Nom as he journeys through different eras to feed his candy cravings.

In Cut the Rope: Time Travel, players will encounter familiar gameplay mechanics with a time-bending twist. The goal remains the same: to feed the adorable green creature, Om Nom, by cutting ropes and solving clever puzzles. However, this time, players will navigate through various time periods, including the Middle Ages, the Renaissance, Ancient Egypt, and more.

Each era introduces unique challenges and obstacles that players must overcome to reach Om Nom and deliver the delicious candy. From interacting with magical spells to avoiding ancient traps, players must employ strategy and timing to cut the ropes at the right moment and collect stars along the way.

The game retains the intuitive touch or mouse controls that made the original Cut the Rope so enjoyable. Players can swipe or click to cut ropes, activate special objects, and interact with the environment to guide the candy through each level. The physics-based gameplay adds an extra layer of excitement and unpredictability to the puzzles.

Cut the Rope: Time Travel on Chrome Extension offers visually stunning graphics and charming animations that breathe life into each time period. The attention to detail in the level design and character animations creates an immersive and visually appealing experience. The sound effects and music add to the lively atmosphere, enhancing the overall enjoyment of the game.

With its inventive time-traveling concept, challenging puzzles, and adorable characters, Cut the Rope: Time Travel on Chrome Extension offers hours of fun and brain-teasing gameplay. So, prepare to journey through time, solve intricate puzzles, and satisfy Om Nom's insatiable sweet tooth in this delightful and addictive puzzle adventure!

Note: After installing the extension, upon clicking on the browser action button, the game popup appears with options of Unblocked games and Web version for Short Life Unblocked!
